üé≠ Reaction Roles Setup Guide

Learn how to set up reaction roles so members can assign themselves roles by clicking emoji reactions on messages.

1
Access the Dashboard

Log in to the admin dashboard at /dashboard with your Discord account.

Select your server from the server dropdown menu.

üí° Only server admins can access the dashboard

2
Navigate to React Roles Section

In the sidebar, click on the "React Roles" tab.

This is where you'll configure which reactions assign which roles.

3
Create a New Reaction Role

Click "Add Reaction Role" button.

  • Select the emoji: Choose an emoji (e.g., üéÆ, üé®, üéµ)
  • Select the role: Pick which role to assign when clicked
  • Select the message: Choose which message to add the reaction to
üí° The message must be a bot message or one you have permissions to edit

4
Save Your Changes

Click the "Save Changes" button at the bottom of the panel.

Wait for the success notification to confirm.

5
Test It Out

Go to your Discord server and find the message with the reaction role.

Click the emoji - you should automatically receive the role!

‚úÖ If it works, you've successfully set up reaction roles!

6
Add More Reaction Roles (Optional)

Repeat steps 3-5 to add more reaction roles to the same message or create new ones.

  • Multiple roles can be assigned to one message
  • Members can click multiple emojis to get multiple roles
  • Clicking again removes the role
